branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-A*Z, Mechanically Jointed, w/Stroke Adjuster - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY1B-A*Z Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. Air cushions are standard adjustable with an easy access cushion needle, and external shock absorbers are optional. Auto-switch mounting has been enhanced with a face mounting feature.</p>
